author: Staff Correspondent . Sylhet
title: Khadija returns home after 4 months
text:
Khadija returns home after 4 months Staff Correspondent . Sylhet | Update: 18:38, Feb 01, 2017 0 Like 
Sylhet college girl Khadija Akter, who was brutally hacked by a former BCL leader Badrul, returned home after a four-month medical treatment. 
She reached Sylhet with her brother Shahin Ahmad by air flight at about 2:30pm. Family members welcomed her there. 
On 3 October afternoon, the BCL leader chopped the MC College student indiscriminately. Local people rescued Khadija and took her to MAG Osmani Medical College Hospital. As her health condition deteriorated, she was shifted to Square Hospital in Dhaka. 
Badrul was then caught red handed by locals and handed over to the police. He is now in prison. 
On 28 November, Khadija was admitted to Centre for Rehabilitation of Paralysed after preliminary recovery. 
Her brother Shahin told journalists that his sister was taken to Sylhet for a week. She will again be taken to the CRP for further treatment.
